biotools.summary: SODA is a tool for species delimitation using only gene tree topologies. It's a fast way of doing species delimitation and relies on a polytomy test developed by Sayyari et. al implemented inside ASTRAL package. SODA has been in our tests slightly less accurate than BPP but it is far faster.
